name: Fix Server Outage
description: Investigate and resolve the server outage issue affecting the production environment.

name: Upgrade Database
description: Upgrade the database system to the latest version to improve performance and security.

name: Implement Backup Solution
description: Set up an automated backup solution for critical data and configurations.

name: Install Security Patches
description: Apply the latest security patches to servers and network devices to address vulnerabilities.

name: Develop User Authentication System
description: Create a user authentication system for the new web application.

name: Optimize Codebase
description: Review and optimize the existing codebase to improve application performance.

name: Deploy New API Endpoint
description: Deploy a new API endpoint to support a mobile app feature.

name: Migrate Email Servers
description: Migrate email servers to a new infrastructure provider for improved reliability.

name: Resolve Network Latency Issue
description: Investigate and resolve network latency issues affecting remote office connectivity.

name: Create Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the IT systems and procedures.

name: Implement Two-Factor Authentication
description: Enhance security by implementing two-factor authentication for user accounts.

name: Upgrade Firewall Rules
description: Review and update firewall rules to ensure network security.

name: Set Up Monitoring Alerts
description: Configure monitoring alerts for critical system components to proactively detect issues.

name: Patch Software Vulnerabilities
description: Identify and patch software vulnerabilities to mitigate security risks.

name: Deploy Load Balancer
description: Deploy a load balancer to distribute traffic evenly across multiple servers.

name: Create Backup Strategy
description: Develop a backup strategy to ensure data recovery in case of failures.

name: Configure DNS Settings
description: Configure DNS settings for a new domain to point to the correct servers.

name: Optimize Database Queries
description: Optimize database queries to improve application response times.

name: Implement Data Encryption
description: Implement data encryption to enhance data security during transmission and storage.

name: Upgrade Web Server Software
description: Upgrade the web server software to the latest stable version.
